org.asl.socketserver

Class Dictionary

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.asl.socketserver.Dictionary

  • public final class Dictionary
extends java.lang.Object
    Library that provides methods for retrieving words from a word source. The default source is Google's 10000 most frequently used words in USA English (w/o swear words) and is taken from https://github.com/first20hours/google-10000-english
    Version:
    Fall, 2017
    Author:
    K. Collins

    • Method Detail

      • getImmutableList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getImmutableList()
        Returns an immutable version of the word source. Immutability is needed so that a single copy of the dictionary may be stored in memory and used as a common resource by all threads. While every thread can therefore read freely from the list, no thread may write to, delete from, or otherwise modify the list.
        Returns:
        a reference to an immutable word list

      • randomByFirstCharacter

        public static java.lang.String randomByFirstCharacter(java.lang.Character c)
        Return a random word beginning with the specified letter
        Parameters:
        c - the initial character
        Returns:
        a random word starting with c

      • randomByFirstLetter

        public static java.lang.String randomByFirstLetter(java.lang.String s)
        Returns a random word beginning with the specified letter
        Parameters:
        s - the initial letter
        Returns:
        a random word beginning with s

      • randomBySize

        public static java.lang.String randomBySize(int i)
        Return a random word of the specified size.
        Parameters:
        i - the size
        Returns:
        a random word of size i

      • randomBySize

        public static java.lang.String randomBySize(int min,
                                            int max)
        Return a random word between min and max characters long, inclusive.
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum length of a qualifying word
        max - the maximum length of a qualifying word
        Returns:
        a word meeting the length criteria

      • random

        public static java.lang.String random()
        Returns a random word from the word source
        Returns:
        a random word from the entire dictionary
